title: support wanted
body: i have just started playing ranked as adc, but every game i play i usually feed. now im no blaming my support, but some of the things they do are dumb af! so it would we cool if i could find someone really good at support and we could duo together

replies.body: I main support as well as ADC. Do you know the ADC can actually 1 vs 2 in bot without a support? All you do is stay close to your tower and last hit. A good support can make plays for the team but it is always the ADC's fault with bad positioning if they feeds.
Bro... your KDA as ADC is horrendous...
